column5: For those that want to support this initiative, here is a link to sign the petition...  https://www.change.org/en-CA/petitions/turn-the-cn-tower-into-world-s-biggest-goal-light-for-the-leafs-playoffs  I think Budweiser should sponsor this, but in the interim, hopefully enough signatures are garnered to get this to happen.  What a great, inexpensive way to further showcase Toronto to those in North America
Let's hope the Leafs sweep the first round
Pretty sure they will do this for the next rounds as well.
They just want to make it red to support the habs on sat. night lol
Well that's one way to conserve energy!
Hey,they light it up all night anyways,what a great idea,no extra cost I can see.?Well maybe a goal judge lol.
Then after they can sell it on eBay as brand new.... Never used
Heck all they need to do is get one of those Budweiser goal lights and add a relay that turns off the blue lights and flashes some red lights  when the Leafs score. Like how hard could that be?
Ya but it will be all set up when they make the playoffs again in 10 years.
